snippet: Yemen's Shiite rebel group on Monday presented the government with new demands in order to stop their protests, hardening their positions and prolonging the standoff that has brought protest tents to the capital....

headline.print_headline: Yemen Shiite Rebels Harden Their Protest Demands
headline.main: Yemen Shiite Rebels Harden Their Protest Demands

lead_paragraph: Yemen's Shiite rebel group on Monday presented the government with new demands in order to stop their protests, hardening their positions and prolonging the standoff that has brought protest tents to the capital.
